metadata.title: CVE-2024-53164 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: fix ordering of qlen adjustmentChanges to sch->q.qlen around qdisc_tree_reduce_backlog() need to happen_before_ a call to said function because otherwise it may fail to notifyparent qdiscs when the child is about to become empty.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-205-generic - 5.4.0-205.225~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-205-lowlatency - 5.4.0-205.225~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1142-gcp - 5.4.0-1142.151~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1085-ibm - 5.4.0-1085.90~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1137-oracle - 5.4.0-1137.146~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
